Mentor Guide:
You can suggest another character for his mentoring, clicking the + button in the section Mentoring.
If You are a Mentor in the Mentoring You will find characters who can become Your Disciples.
But not every character can become a Mentor or mentee. Become a Mentor character may 85 level and above who completed the rebirth, and the Student must be 85 level and below.If the relationship between Mentor and Disciple is interrupted, the Mentor may not take other Students for 2 days. If the Student has completed the training, the instructor may not take other Students in 1 day.
